news_header: Isuzu Motors reports a 31.1% decrease in net income for the nine-month period.
news_original_title: Isuzu Motors 9-month Profit Declines, Net Sales Down 7.3%; Affirms FY25 Guidance
news_text: Isuzu Motors reported a net income of 109.85 billion yen for the nine-month period, a 31.1% decline from last year. Earnings per share fell to 148.34 yen from 206.31 yen, and net sales decreased by 7.3% to 2.36 trillion yen. For fiscal 2025, the company projects earnings per share of 183.76 yen and net sales of 3.25 trillion yen, with no changes to the full-year financial forecast released on November 11, 2024.
